hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for specialized tourism, visa, and comprehensive business setup services within the United Arab Emirates
hero.slogan: Your Trips, Travels, and even Your Business… Are Safe with PHOENIQIA Group

business.title: Business Services
business.description: Complete business setup and legal support in the UAE

items.title: Complete Business Setup and Legal Support in the UAE
items.description: Start your business in the UAE with confidence — with Phoenicia Group by your side at every turn. From initial planning to legal compliance, our end-to-end support ensures your company stands on solid ground, ready to grow and succeed in one of the world’s fastest-growing economies.

items.title: Company Formation in the UAE
items.description: We assist in opening companies in Dubai or the Northern Emirates, issuing trade licenses and residency permits with comprehensive legal and financial support tailored to your business activity.

items.title: Trade License Renewal
items.description: Never miss a deadline — Phoenicia Group handles your trade license renewal swiftly and flawlessly. We track expiry dates, prepare documentation, and file renewals on time so your business remains fully operational and compliant.

items.title: Issuing New Licenses
items.description: Need a new trade license? Phoenicia Group simplifies the process end to end. We prepare, submit, and follow up on applications so you get your business up and running fast without bureaucratic delays.

items.title: Payment Permission Reduction
items.description: Lower your operational costs effortlessly — Phoenicia Group negotiates reduced payment permissions on your behalf, optimizing expenses and scaling your financial efficiency as your business grows.

items.title: Providing Rent Contracts for License Renewal
items.description: Everything aligned for your renewal — we arrange necessary rent or tenancy contracts that meet official standards, ensuring you are always ready for trade license renewal.

items.title: Providing and Opening Quotas for Companies
items.description: Expand confidently with Phoenicia Group’s assistance in obtaining and opening business quotas swiftly, clearing the way to grow your enterprise without delay.

items.title: Providing a Local Sponsor for Company Sponsorship
items.description: Your local ally in the UAE — we connect you with trusted local sponsors to ensure legal compliance and smooth company setup with clear agreements and ongoing support.

items.title: Submitting Appeals for Violators
items.description: Faced with a compliance issue? Phoenicia Group advocates for you by submitting appeals, negotiating, and resolving violations professionally to protect your business reputation.

items.title: Issuing One- and Two-Month Tourist Visas
items.description: Need short-term entry for business or pleasure? We arrange one- and two-month tourist visas swiftly, managing all paperwork for a seamless visit from arrival to departure.

items.title: Processing Residency Permits for Wife and Children
items.description: Keep the family together — Phoenicia Group handles spouse and child residency permits with utmost care, supporting your application from start to finish for easy relocation.
docs: Emirates ID and residence stamping forms

items.title: Handling All Tasheel and Amer Transactions
items.description: Simplify government transactions — with Phoenicia Group managing all Tasheel and Amer services, saving you time and avoiding hassle on permits, labor cards, visas, and Emirates ID.

business.motto: Start Your Business in the UAE with Confidence with PHOENIQIA Group… And We're With You Every Step of the Way

items.title: Tourist Visa from Egypt to the UAE
items.description: Embrace the magic of Dubai with zero stress. At Phoenicia Group, we turn your tourist visa application into a seamless first step of your journey. From submitting precise paperwork to fast-tracking approvals, our expert team ensures your trip begins with confidence and clarity — so you can focus on what truly matters: the adventure ahead.

items.title: Schengen Visa from the UAE to Europe
items.description: Set your sights on Europe — let Phoenicia Group take care of the complexity. We guide you through each requirement with precision, helping you present a visa application that shines. Confident, compliant, and compelling — your European adventure starts here.
docs: Passport (valid ≥ 3 months beyond trip; blank pages)
Employment letter or business license / sponsorship letter

items.title: Consultations & Preparing Strong Visa Files
items.description: Why risk a rejection? At Phoenicia Group, we transform your visa documents into a polished, persuasive package. Whether it’s a cover letter, sponsorship proof, or itinerary — we craft each piece to give your application maximum clarity and strength.
docs: Cover letter that clearly states travel intent
Bank statements (3–6 months) with clarity & balance

items.title: Quick Appointments for Visa Processing
items.description: Don’t wait in queues — get your visa sorted fast. With Phoenicia Group’s strategic embassy and VAC connections, we secure early appointment slots and expedite your application, even during peak seasons. Your time is precious — and we value it.
docs: Fully completed visa application & supporting documents
Clear passport and photo scans, submitted early

items.title: Premium Hajj & Umrah Packages with Luxury Accommodation
items.description: Begin your spiritual journey wrapped in comfort and elegance. Phoenicia Group curates VIP Hajj and Umrah experiences where luxury meets devotion: premium lodging, smooth logistics, and heartfelt guidance — all tailored to elevate your sacred trip.
docs: Vaccination certificates (e.g., meningitis, COVID if needed)

items.title: Organizing Monthly Umrah Trips from Egypt and the UAE
items.description: Your monthly spiritual retreat awaits — planned fully by Phoenicia Group. From visa to VIP transfers, we organize a turnkey Umrah experience with unwavering care: peace of mind, convenience, and devotion bundled in one seamless package.
docs: Proof of residence (UAE applicants) or national ID (Egyptian)
Flight, hotel, and local transport bookings

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: PHOENIQIA Group is a company specialized in providing tourism and visa services, in addition to business setup services within the United Arab Emirates. With years of experience, we help you ensure your trips, travels, and even your business… are safe with PHOENIQIA Group.
about.mission: Our mission is to provide exceptional service and support to our clients, ensuring their success in all their endeavors within the UAE.
about.values: We are committed to excellence, integrity, and building lasting relationships with our clients.
about.cta: Contact us via WhatsApp for more information
